alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Dawson; McCone; Northern Valley; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 2:41PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central and Southern Valley, McCone, Dawson, Prairie and Northern Valley Counties. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ranchers with calving operations should take precautions to ensure safety of livestock.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
